Public NotInheritable Class TemplateVisualStateAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TemplateVisualStateAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定控件可处于特定状态，并且 应该位于该控件的 中。

span.span: Specifies that a control can be in a certain state and that a is expected in the control's .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件作者使用此特性来指定属于控件的中的和对象。Control authors use this attribute to specify the and objects that belong in their control's . 例如，假设您创建了一个新控件，该控件具有两个名`Focused`为`Unfocused`和的可视状态，这两个`FocusStates`状态都位于一个命名的中。For example, suppose that you create a new control that has two visual states named `Focused` and `Unfocused`, both of which are in a named `FocusStates`. 若要指定他们可以使用这些可视状态的作者，请将两个特性添加到控件的类签名。To specify to authors that they can use those visual states, add two attributes to the class signature of the control. `Unfocused` `Focused`指定 属性为，并且属性为一个， `FocusStates` 另一个是。Specify that the property is `FocusStates` and that the property is `Focused` for one and `Unfocused` for the other. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`NumericUpDown`控件的类签名。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 此示例指定`NumericUpDown`控件使用四种可视状态。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 名为`Positive`和`Negative`的两个状态位于命名 `ValueStates`的中。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他两个`Focused`状态分别为`Unfocused` `FocusedStates`、名称和。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[创建具有可自定义外观的控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于对象的 属性。 The property corresponds to the property of a object. 若要指定 所属的内容，请设置属性。 To specify what a belongs in, set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`NumericUpDown`控件的类签名。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 此示例指定`NumericUpDown`控件使用四种可视状态。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 名为`Positive`和`Negative`的两个状态位于命名 `ValueStates`的中。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他两个`Focused`状态分别为`Unfocused` `FocusedStates`、名称和。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[创建具有可自定义外观的控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与的 属性 相对应。 The property corresponds to the property of a . 若要指定控件的中的内容，请设置属性。To specify what belongs in a control's , set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`NumericUpDown`控件的类签名。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 此示例指定`NumericUpDown`控件使用四种可视状态。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 名为`Positive`和`Negative`的两个状态位于命名 `ValueStates`的中。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他两个`Focused`状态分别为`Unfocused` `FocusedStates`、名称和。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[创建具有可自定义外观的控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md).
